name: Greek Yogurt Bowl
ingredients: yogurt, almonds, berries, banana
instructions: Combine yogurt with almonds, berries, and banana. Serve chilled.

name: Moong Dal Chilla / Paneer Bhurji
ingredients: moong dal batter, paneer, spinach, toast, apple, orange
instructions: Prepare savory pancakes with moong dal batter or cook scrambled paneer with spinach. Serve with toast and apple or orange.

name: Overnight Oats
ingredients: oats, berries, chia seeds, nuts, egg
instructions: Combine oats, berries, chia seeds, and nuts. Refrigerate overnight. Serve with egg.

name: Veggie Omelette
ingredients: eggs, kale, bell peppers, mushrooms, toast, apple
instructions: Whisk eggs and cook with kale, bell peppers, and mushrooms. Serve with toast and apple.

name: Egg Bhurji (Indian Style Scrambled Eggs)
ingredients: eggs, tomatoes, onions, spices
instructions: Scramble eggs with tomatoes, onions, and spices until cooked.

name: Spiced Yogurt Bowl
ingredients: yogurt, cashews, chili powder, banana
instructions: Mix yogurt with cashews and chili powder. Top with banana.

name: Masala Omelette
ingredients: eggs, spices, toast, banana
instructions: Beat eggs with spices. Cook omelette. Serve with toast and banana.

name: Quinoa Porridge
ingredients: quinoa, nuts, banana, berries
instructions: Cook quinoa into porridge. Top with nuts, banana, or berries.

name: Shakshuka Breakfast / Spinach-Feta Scrambled Eggs
ingredients: eggs, tomato sauce, spinach, feta, roti, banana
instructions: Poach eggs in tomato sauce or cook eggs with spinach and feta. Serve with roti and banana.

name: Chickpea Salad
ingredients: chickpeas, greens, eggs
instructions: Mix chickpeas with greens. Add eggs if desired.

name: Fattoush Salad & Quinoa
ingredients: quinoa, feta, olives, vegetables, orange slices, chicken skewers
instructions: Mix fattoush salad ingredients with quinoa, feta, and olives. Serve with orange slices and chicken skewers.

name: Mediterranean Stir-fry
ingredients: peppers, onions, spinach, tomatoes, chickpeas, feta, chicken
instructions: Stir-fry peppers, onions, spinach, and tomatoes. Add chickpeas and feta or chicken.

name: Burrito Bowls
ingredients: cauliflower rice, black beans, salsa, avocado, yogurt, tofu, paneer, ground beef, chicken
instructions: Assemble bowls with cauliflower rice, black beans, salsa, avocado, and yogurt. Add tofu, paneer, ground meat, or chicken.

name: Wraps with Black Beans
ingredients: wraps, black beans, vegetables, avocado, fruit, chicken, shrimp
instructions: Fill wraps with beans, vegetables, avocado. Serve with fruit. Add chicken or shrimp.

name: Grilled Halloumi/Tofu & Roasted Veg
ingredients: halloumi, tofu, vegetables, couscous, orange slices, salmon
instructions: Grill halloumi or tofu. Serve with vegetables, couscous, orange slices, or salmon.

name: Pasta with Spinach
ingredients: pasta, spinach, beans, tomato sauce, apple, pear, tuna
instructions: Cook pasta with spinach, beans, tomato sauce. Serve with apple or pear. Add tuna.

name: Mezze Platter
ingredients: hummus, tzatziki, tabbouleh, falafel, eggs, melon slices, lamb, chicken skewers
instructions: Assemble platter with hummus, tzatziki, tabbouleh, falafel or eggs. Serve with melon slices and lamb or chicken skewers.

name: Indian Curry Night
ingredients: curry base, cauliflower rice, paneer, spinach, lamb
instructions: Prepare curry base. Serve with cauliflower rice. Add paneer, spinach, or lamb.

name: Brown Rice & Chana Masala
ingredients: brown rice, chana masala, greens, salad, berries, chicken breast
instructions: Serve chana masala with brown rice, greens, salad, berries, and chicken breast.

name: Shakshuka
ingredients: eggs, tomato sauce, pepper sauce, lamb meatballs, turkey sausage
instructions: Poach eggs in tomato and pepper sauce. Add meatballs or sausage.

name: Sheet Pan Dinner
ingredients: broccoli, asparagus, bell peppers, paneer, tofu, salmon, chicken thighs
instructions: Roast broccoli, asparagus, bell peppers. Add paneer, tofu, salmon, or chicken thighs.

name: Kebab Night
ingredients: kebabs, green beans, cucumber yogurt salad
instructions: Grill kebabs with green beans. Serve with cucumber yogurt salad.

name: Moroccan Lentil & Vegetable Stew
ingredients: lentils, vegetables, spices, chicken, lamb
instructions: Cook lentils with vegetables and spices. Add chicken or lamb.

name: Stir-fry Tofu/Chicken
ingredients: broccoli, peppers, tofu, chicken, rice, noodles, watermelon
instructions: Stir-fry broccoli and peppers. Add tofu or chicken. Serve with rice or noodles and watermelon.

name: Paneer & Chickpea Curry
ingredients: paneer, chickpeas, curry spices, rice, cucumber salad, orange, chicken
instructions: Cook paneer and chickpeas with curry spices. Serve with rice, cucumber salad, orange, and chicken.

name: Palak Paneer Chappathi
ingredients: paneer, spinach, onions, tomatoes
instructions: Cook spinach and paneer. Serve with chapati.

name: Chicken Tikka
ingredients: chicken, onions, tomatoes
instructions: Cook chicken tikka with onions and tomatoes. Serve with chapati.

name: Palak Tofu
ingredients: tofu, spinach, naan, vegetable sabzi, orange slices
instructions: Cook spinach with tofu curry. Serve with naan, vegetable sabzi, and orange slices.

name: Chicken Curry
ingredients: chicken, spinach, naan, vegetable sabzi, orange slices
instructions: Cook chicken curry with spinach. Serve with naan, vegetable sabzi, and orange slices.

name: Masala Boiled Eggs
ingredients: eggs, masala spice
instructions: Sprinkle masala on boiled eggs and serve.

name: Mixed Nuts & Apple Slices
ingredients: almonds, walnuts, apple
instructions: Serve almonds and walnuts with apple slices.

name: Hummus & Veggie Sticks
ingredients: cucumber sticks, carrot sticks, hummus, grapes, melon
instructions: Serve vegetable sticks with hummus and grapes or melon.

name: Cottage Cheese & Berries
ingredients: cottage cheese, berries, strawberries
instructions: Serve cottage cheese with berries or strawberries.

name: Nuts, Dried Fruit, Cheese & Crackers
ingredients: nuts, dried fruit, cheese, crackers
instructions: Mix nuts, dried fruit, cheese, and crackers.

name: Paneer Tikka & Pear Slices
ingredients: paneer, spices, pear slices
instructions: Pan-fry paneer with spices. Serve with pear slices.

name: Cumin Yogurt & Orange Segments
ingredients: yogurt, cumin powder, orange segments
instructions: Mix yogurt with cumin powder. Serve with orange segments.

name: Veggies & Tzatziki
ingredients: vegetable sticks, tzatziki, grapes
instructions: Serve vegetable sticks with tzatziki and grapes.

name: Smoothie
ingredients: yogurt, banana, berries, nuts
instructions: Blend yogurt, banana, berries, and nuts.

name: Roasted Chickpeas & Grapes
ingredients: chickpeas, grapes
instructions: Serve roasted chickpeas with grapes.

name: Cook Lentils/Dal
ingredients: lentils, dal
instructions: Cook lentils or dal. Store for meals.

name: Roast Vegetables
ingredients: bell peppers, broccoli, zucchini, onions
instructions: Chop and roast vegetables. Store for later.

name: Marinate Proteins
ingredients: chicken, lamb, paneer, tofu, yogurt, spices
instructions: Marinate proteins in yogurt and spices.

name: Make Cauliflower Rice
ingredients: cauliflower
instructions: Grate or pulse cauliflower into rice texture.

name: Boil Eggs
ingredients: eggs
instructions: Boil eggs for 10-15 mins. Store for meals.

name: Mix Dips & Sauces
ingredients: hummus, cucumber yogurt salad, tzatziki, curry paste
instructions: Prepare dips and sauces in advance.

name: Puliyar Chutney
ingredients: rice, tamarind, peanuts, spices
instructions: Cook rice and mix with tamarind, peanuts, and spices. Serve with yogurt.
